entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 40%
